page.title: 05KATIE'S MONDAY AFTERNOON
page.content: Monday afternoons are when we do Art. Today we were doing self-portraits, first drawing, then painting. This took three lessons. My drawing was not too bad, but the painting was terrible! At 2.15 p.m. Class 1 went out for Break. At 2.15 the whistle signalled In-time. I tried to salvage my painting, but failed. My hair became a muddy green, and my lips became a reddy-blue. At 3.30 p.m. school finishes and Mum was there to collect me in the car. I had developed a headache so didn't go to Gymnastics. Instead I took a Paracetamol tablet and fell asleep. A dropped mug awoke me at about 8.00 p.m. I enjoy 'Wogan' because he is entertaining and amusing, but on this rare occasion I missed it, and most of 'Fame', the programme which follows , so I said goodnight to everyone and went to bed.
